properties.displayName: Deploy VM High Memory Utilization Metric Alerts
properties.description: Creates a new metric alert rule with a trigger condition on percent free memory based on the memoryAvailableThresholdPercent parameter. Both the VM size's memory allocation and percentage lookup must exist in the policy definition resource template.

metadata.description: An integer value for percent memory available at which to trigger the alert. Example: 15
The resource ID of an Action Group for the alert to call when triggered.
